Package arcade.potts.sim.hamiltonian

Class PersistenceHamiltonian

    Hamiltonian
    public class PersistenceHamiltonian
extends java.lang.Object
implements Hamiltonian
    Implementation of Hamiltonian for persistence energy.

      • getDelta

        public double getDelta​(int sourceID,
                       int targetID,
                       int x,
                       int y,
                       int z)
        Gets change in energy.

        Persistence energy is calculated by taking the sum of source and target persistence energies. Source energy is calculated from displacement when a voxel is removed. Target energy is calculated from displacement when a voxel is added.

        Specified by:
        getDelta in interface Hamiltonian
        Parameters:
        sourceID - the id of the source voxel
        targetID - the id of the target voxel
        x - the x coordinate
        y - the y coordinate
        z - the z coordinate
        Returns:
        the change in energy

      • getDelta

        public double getDelta​(int id,
                       int sourceRegion,
                       int targetRegion,
                       int x,
                       int y,
                       int z)
        Gets change in energy for region.

        Persistence energy is calculated by taking the sum of source and target persistence energies for the region. Source energy is calculated from displacement when a voxel is removed. Target energy is calculated from displacement when a voxel is added.

        Specified by:
        getDelta in interface Hamiltonian
        Parameters:
        id - the voxel id
        sourceRegion - the region of the source voxel
        targetRegion - the region of the source voxel
        x - the x coordinate
        y - the y coordinate
        z - the z coordinate
        Returns:
        the change in energy

      • getPersistence

        double getPersistence​(int id,
                      int x,
                      int y,
                      int z,
                      int change)
        Gets persistence energy for voxel added or removed.

        Persistence for non-cell voxels is zero.

        Parameters:
        id - the voxel id
        x - the x coordinate
        y - the y coordinate
        z - the z coordinate
        change - the direction of change (add = +1, remove = -1)
        Returns:
        the energy

      • getPersistence

        double getPersistence​(int id,
                      int t,
                      int x,
                      int y,
                      int z,
                      int change)
        Gets the persistence energy for voxel added or removed in a region.

        Persistence for the default region is zero. Calculating persistence for a region does not update the target vector or displacement vectors for the cell.

        Parameters:
        id - the voxel id
        t - the voxel region
        x - the x coordinate
        y - the y coordinate
        z - the z coordinate
        change - the direction of change (add = +1, remove = -1)
        Returns:
        the energy

      • initialize

        void initialize​(PottsSeries series)
        Initializes parameters for persistence hamiltonian term.
        Parameters:
        series - the series instance
